NYS Digital Services Utilities

A simple, functional, and portable set of components for your NYS website or application.

View the Component Index

We're still in beta so please forgive any component testing in the open!

This is a static website. In the traditional sense, it's "just a website." HTML, CSS, and some javascript are the only things powering this website and design system. As a static website it's generated using the static site generator 11ty/eleventy: a powerful javascript-based jekyll alternative.

Some More Components

  • Youtube Video Embeds
  • Sponsor Logos
  • Question and Answer Tool
  • FOIL Dropdown
  • Escape Button Comparison
  • Progressive Disclosure Filter
  • ASL Button Demo
  • Tableau Embeds Test
  • Governor CTA Footer
  • Social Media Deeplinking
  • Feedback Component
  • Strategy Pillars
  • Callout
  • Services Search Hero
  • Find Services Highlight
